								                    Relapsed Chronic Myelogenous Leukemia
								                    Treatment of relapsed chronic myelogenous leukemia may include the following:         -  Targeted therapy with a tyrosine kinase inhibitor.    -  Donor stem cell transplant.    -  Chemotherapy.     -  Donor lymphocyte infusion.
